# tsfeatures ![](reference/figures/tsfeatures-hex.png)

The R package *tsfeatures* provides methods for extracting various
features from time series data.

## Installation

You can install the **stable** version on [R
CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/package=tsfeatures).

``` r
install.packages('tsfeatures', dependencies = TRUE)
```

You can install the **development** version from
[Github](https://github.com/robjhyndman/tsfeatures) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("robjhyndman/tsfeatures")
```

## Usage

``` r
library(tsfeatures)
mylist <- list(sunspot.year, WWWusage, AirPassengers, USAccDeaths)
myfeatures <- tsfeatures(mylist)
myfeatures
#> # A tibble: 4 × 20
#>   frequency nperiods seasonal_period trend      spike linearity curvature e_acf1
#>       <dbl>    <dbl>           <dbl> <dbl>      <dbl>     <dbl>     <dbl>  <dbl>
#> 1         1        0               1 0.125    2.10e-5      3.58      1.11  0.793
#> 2         1        0               1 0.985    3.01e-8      4.45      1.10  0.774
#> 3        12        1              12 0.991    1.46e-8     11.0       1.09  0.509
#> 4        12        1              12 0.802    9.15e-7     -2.12      2.85  0.258
#> # ℹ 12 more variables: e_acf10 <dbl>, entropy <dbl>, x_acf1 <dbl>,
#> #   x_acf10 <dbl>, diff1_acf1 <dbl>, diff1_acf10 <dbl>, diff2_acf1 <dbl>,
#> #   diff2_acf10 <dbl>, seasonal_strength <dbl>, peak <dbl>, trough <dbl>,
#> #   seas_acf1 <dbl>
```

## License

This package is free and open source software, licensed under GPL-3.

# Package index

## Package

tsfeatures package

- [`tsfeatures-package`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/tsfeatures-package.md)
  [`_PACKAGE`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/tsfeatures-package.md)
  : tsfeatures: Time Series Feature Extraction

## tsfeatures

The main function to extract features from a list of time series.

- [`tsfeatures()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/tsfeatures.md)
  : Time series feature matrix

## Feature functions

Functions which compute features from time series

- [`ac_9()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/ac_9.md) :
  Autocorrelation at lag 9. Included for completion and consistency.

- [`acf_features()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/acf_features.md)
  : Autocorrelation-based features

- [`arch_stat()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/arch_stat.md)
  : ARCH LM Statistic

- [`autocorr_features()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/autocorr_features.md)
  :

  The autocorrelation feature set from software package `hctsa`

- [`binarize_mean()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/binarize_mean.md)
  :

  Converts an input vector into a binarized version from software
  package `hctsa`

- [`compengine()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/compengine.md)
  : CompEngine feature set

- [`crossing_points()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/crossing_points.md)
  : Number of crossing points

- [`dist_features()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/dist_features.md)
  :

  The distribution feature set from software package `hctsa`

- [`embed2_incircle()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/embed2_incircle.md)
  :

  Points inside a given circular boundary in a 2-d embedding space from
  software package `hctsa`

- [`entropy()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/entropy.md)
  : Spectral entropy of a time series

- [`firstmin_ac()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/firstmin_ac.md)
  :

  Time of first minimum in the autocorrelation function from software
  package `hctsa`

- [`firstzero_ac()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/firstzero_ac.md)
  :

  The first zero crossing of the autocorrelation function from software
  package `hctsa`

- [`flat_spots()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/flat_spots.md)
  : Longest flat spot

- [`fluctanal_prop_r1()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/fluctanal_prop_r1.md)
  :

  Implements fluctuation analysis from software package `hctsa`

- [`heterogeneity()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/heterogeneity.md)
  : Heterogeneity coefficients

- [`histogram_mode()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/histogram_mode.md)
  :

  Mode of a data vector from software package `hctsa`

- [`holt_parameters()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/holt_parameters.md)
  [`hw_parameters()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/holt_parameters.md)
  : Parameter estimates of Holt's linear trend method

- [`hurst()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/hurst.md)
  : Hurst coefficient

- [`localsimple_taures()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/localsimple_taures.md)
  :

  The first zero crossing of the autocorrelation function of the
  residuals from Simple local time-series forecasting from software
  package `hctsa`

- [`lumpiness()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/lumpiness.md)
  [`stability()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/lumpiness.md)
  : Time series features based on tiled windows

- [`max_level_shift()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/max_level_shift.md)
  [`max_var_shift()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/max_level_shift.md)
  [`max_kl_shift()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/max_level_shift.md)
  : Time series features based on sliding windows

- [`motiftwo_entro3()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/motiftwo_entro3.md)
  :

  Local motifs in a binary symbolization of the time series from
  software package `hctsa`

- [`nonlinearity()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/nonlinearity.md)
  : Nonlinearity coefficient

- [`outlierinclude_mdrmd()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/outlierinclude_mdrmd.md)
  :

  How median depend on distributional outliers from software package
  `hctsa`

- [`pacf_features()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/pacf_features.md)
  : Partial autocorrelation-based features

- [`pred_features()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/pred_features.md)
  :

  The prediction feature set from software package `hctsa`

- [`sampen_first()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/sampen_first.md)
  :

  Second Sample Entropy of a time series from software package `hctsa`

- [`sampenc()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/sampenc.md)
  :

  Second Sample Entropy from software package `hctsa`

- [`scal_features()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/scal_features.md)
  :

  The scaling feature set from software package `hctsa`

- [`spreadrandomlocal_meantaul()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/spreadrandomlocal_meantaul.md)
  :

  Bootstrap-based stationarity measure from software package `hctsa`

- [`station_features()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/station_features.md)
  :

  The stationarity feature set from software package `hctsa`

- [`std1st_der()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/std1st_der.md)
  :

  Standard deviation of the first derivative of the time series from
  software package `hctsa`

- [`stl_features()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/stl_features.md)
  : Strength of trend and seasonality of a time series

- [`trev_num()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/trev_num.md)
  :

  Normalized nonlinear autocorrelation, the numerator of the trev
  function of a time series from software package `hctsa`

- [`unitroot_kpss()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/unitroot_kpss.md)
  [`unitroot_pp()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/unitroot_kpss.md)
  : Unit Root Test Statistics

- [`walker_propcross()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/walker_propcross.md)
  :

  Simulates a hypothetical walker moving through the time domain from
  software package `hctsa`

- [`zero_proportion()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/zero_proportion.md)
  : Proportion of zeros

## Utility functions

- [`as.list(`*`<mts>`*`)`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/as.list.mts.md)
  : Convert mts object to list of time series

## Data

Download data providing Yahoo server metrics

- [`yahoo_data()`](http://pkg.robjhyndman.com/tsfeatures/reference/yahoo_data.md)
  : Yahoo server metrics
